kernfrasen: Der Baustein, den die Bauleute verwarfen, ist zum Eckstein geworden
Öffne mir das Tor der Gerechtigkeit
Eckstein für das neue Haus aller Menschen
dominante_domeinen.conceptuele_metafoor: SOCIETY IS A BUILDING / JUSTICE IS AN ENTRANCE

kernfrasen: The world is not for sale
Du stellst meine Füße auf weiten Raum
dominante_domeinen.conceptuele_metafoor: FAITH IS MOVEMENT FROM CONFINEMENT TO SPACE

metafoor_inventaris.metafoor_expressie: Du stellst meine Füße auf weiten Raum

cognitieve_implicaties: Fear is a physical narrowing of the world
God provides the opposite of claustrophobia
theologische_implicaties: Salvation is not just internal but structural/spatial
onbedoelde_consequenties: Potential loss of the 'narrow path' discipline

metafoor_inventaris.vitaliteit_toelichting: The preacher revitalizes the conventional 'wide space' by contrasting it with the modern 'TINA-syndrome' and neoliberal deregulation.

coherentie_analyse.coherentie_verklaring: The sermon maintains a consistent tension between 'Enge' (narrowness/fear) and 'Weite' (breadth/hope), mapping this onto both psychological and economic realities.

succesvolle_blending.locatie: Section on 'The world is not for sale'
succesvolle_blending.blending_strategie: Contrast: Using economic language to negate economic power over the sacred.

sterktes.beschrijving: Re-activates the 'Stone/Cornerstone' metaphor by applying it to the marginalized in the globalized economy.
sterktes.voorbeeld: Eckstein für das neue Haus aller Menschen

risicos.beschrijving: Risk of reducing the theological concept of 'Enemies' purely to 'Multinational Corporations'.
risicos.voorbeeld: Die Feinde des Lebens... sind die multinationalen Konzerne
risicos.potentiele_impact: Congregation may view salvation as purely political/economic.

text_world_analyse.primaire_wereld: A globalized, neoliberal marketplace that is closing in on the individual.

deictic_shifts.effectiviteit: Highly effective in illustrating 'thinking beyond the real'.

versterkte_schemas.hoe_versterkt: Linked to the physical act of breathing and standing in open space.

verstoorde_schemas.verstoring_strategie: Critiquing the 'homo incurvatus in se ipso' as a target of economic manipulation.

schema_analyse.liturgische_schema_aansluiting: Strong connection to the Corpus Christi (Fronleichnam) context of procession and public witness.

aanbevelingen.metafoor_audit_samenvatting: The sermon is dominated by spatial and architectural metaphors used to frame a socio-political critique. It successfully moves from the 'Enge' (narrowness) of anxiety to the 'Weite' (breadth) of God's justice.

revitalisatie_suggesties.suggestie: Link it more explicitly to the 'discarded' materials of globalization.
revitalisatie_suggesties.voorbeeld: The 'waste' of the global market becoming the foundation.

coherentie_verbeteringen.incoherentie: The tension between 'God as a Song' and 'God as a Wall/Defense'.
coherentie_verbeteringen.resolutie_strategie: Develop the idea of 'Rhythmic Resistance'—the song itself is the defense.

entailment_checks.metafoor: THE WORLD IS NOT FOR SALE
entailment_checks.problematisch_entailment: Suggests God is the 'owner' in a way that mirrors the 'owners' being critiqued.

alternatieve_domeinen.rationale: To counter the 'cloning' and 'genetic' fears mentioned.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A masterclass in using CMT to bridge ancient liturgy with contemporary systemic critique.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_esthetiek: Focuses on the cognitive mapping of 'Enge' to 'Angst' rather than just the beauty of the Psalm's poetry.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_kolb: Moves beyond experiential learning to analyze the underlying conceptual structures of the preacher's worldview.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_CMT: Reveals how the preacher uses spatial metaphors to deconstruct the 'TINA' ideology.

appendices.notities: Preacher uses 'Enge' (narrowness) as a bridge between psychological state and economic restriction.
